auth.confirmEmailError: We couldn't confirm your email. Please check if the provided link is correct
auth.confirmEmailSuccess: Your email has been confirmed. You can now log in to your account.
auth.recoverPasswordSuccess: We've sent you an e-mail with instructions on how to reset your password
auth.registerSuccess: Your account has been created. Please check your email and follow the instructions to activate your account
auth.resetPasswordError: We couldn't reset your password. Please check if the provided link is correct
auth.accountAlreadyConfirmed: The account has been already confirmed
auth.accountAlreadyExists: The account with provided email already exists
auth.accountNotConfirmed: The account is not confirmed. Check your e-mail box to activate your account
